thread.title: California Water Takes SJW Offer Public

author: Austen Hufford
title: California Water Takes SJW Offer Public

organizations.name: california water takes sjw offer public california water service group

text:
California Water Service Group took public its takeover offer for water utility SJW Group Thursday, pressing its bid despite being rebuffed.
The move is part of an unprecedented four-way tussle in a normally merger-averse industry.
SJW last month agreed to a $750 million merger with Connecticut Water Service Inc. Last week, Connecticut Water... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
